_meta.title: EXHAUSTIVE SECOND REVIEW: blueprint.json Correctness Analysis
_meta.purpose: FINAL PARANOID VERIFICATION of blueprint.json against git diff --numstat

executive_summary.overall_trustworthiness: CONDITIONAL - TRUSTWORTHY with minor corrections needed
executive_summary.assessment: The blueprint is substantially correct with accurate file coverage and appropriate prioritization. However, significant line count discrepancies exist in 3 major categories that MUST be corrected before proceeding.

critical_findings.title: PABT Module Line Count Severely Inaccurate
critical_findings.details: Blueprint claims 6,966 lines but actual git diff shows 5,637 lines (1,329 line discrepancy, 23.6% overcount)
critical_findings.impact: Could lead to incorrect time estimates and review scope planning
critical_findings.resolution: Update blueprint.json PABT Module lines_changed to 5,637

major_findings.title: Documentation Line Count Underreported
major_findings.details: Blueprint claims 4,576 lines but actual shows 4,994 lines (418 line discrepancy, 8.4% undercount)
major_findings.impact: Documentation review may be underestimated in scope

major_findings.title: Behavior Tree Line Count Underreported
major_findings.details: Blueprint claims 41 lines but actual shows 121 lines (80 line discrepancy, 66% undercount)
major_findings.impact: Behavior tree review scope significantly underestimated
major_findings.resolution: Update blueprint.json Behavior Tree lines_changed to 121

major_findings.title: Total Lines Changed Discrepancy
major_findings.details: Blueprint summary claims 27,195 lines but git diff --numstat shows 27,286 lines (91 line discrepancy)
major_findings.impact: Minor - discrepancy due to git --stat vs --numstat difference

major_findings.title: Total Insertions Discrepancy
major_findings.details: Blueprint summary claims 24,439 insertions but git diff --numstat shows 24,530 insertions (93 line discrepancy)

minor_findings.title: Pick-and-Place Line Count Slightly Over
minor_findings.details: Blueprint claims 9,796 lines but actual shows 9,596 lines (200 line discrepancy, 2.1% over)
minor_findings.resolution: Update to exact value: 9,596 for consistency

minor_findings.title: Scripting Line Count Over
minor_findings.details: Blueprint claims 2,278 lines but actual shows 2,061 lines (217 line discrepancy, 10.5% over)
minor_findings.impact: Minor - review scope may be slightly overestimated
minor_findings.resolution: Update to exact value: 2,061 for accuracy

minor_findings.title: Minor Omissions from key_files Lists
minor_findings.details: Several smaller files omitted from key_files lists (e.g., graphjsimpl_test.go, bubbletea_test.go)
minor_findings.impact: Minor - completeness but not critical for planning

classification_correctness_verification.summary: All 99 files from git diff are correctly categorized

priority_assessment_verification.summary: Priority assignments are appropriate for each category

critical_priorities.verdict: APPROPRIATE - Both contain critical new functionality with significant line counts

high_priorities.verdict: APPROPRIATE - All contain core infrastructure or security-critical components

medium_priorities.verdict: APPROPRIATE - Supporting components with moderate impact

low_priorities.verdict: APPROPRIATE - Test coverage for game module with limited scope

review_phase_verification.summary: All 6 review phases are defined and appropriate for the scope

recommeded_corrections: CRITICAL: Update PABT Module lines_changed from 6,966 to 5,637
MAJOR: Update Documentation lines_changed from 4,576 to 4,994
MAJOR: Update Behavior Tree lines_changed from 41 to 121
MAJOR: Update summary total insertions from 24,439 to 24,530
MAJOR: Update summary total lines changed from 27,195 to 27,286
MINOR: Update Pick-and-Place lines_changed from 9,796 to 9,596
MINOR: Update Scripting lines_changed from 2,278 to 2,061
OPTIONAL: Add missing files to key_files lists for completeness

trust_conditions: Apply critical and major corrections to line counts
Verify corrected line counts with second peer review
Proceed with review phases in order
final_assessment.overall_quality: EXCELLENT - Structure, coverage, and priorities are all correct. Only line counts need adjustment.

verification_methods: git diff --numstat for precise line counts
